repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is not yet processed.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Materials were located in a storage room in the Hirsh Health Sciences Library in 2012. Eliot Wilczek, University Records Manager, and Veronica Martzahl, Records Archivist, reviewed the files briefly and determined that they would be transferred to DCA at which point an attempt would be made to contact the Darling family and formally transfer rights to the Archives. In early March 2012 Molly Bruce, casual employee, packed up the materials and they were brought over by Facilities on 2012-03-29.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of Donald B. Darling's research and subject files; Northeastern University lectures; publications; TNEMC architectural plans; committee files (School of Medicine and library); School of Medicine faculty meeting minutes and announcements; and annual reports, budgets, and statistics.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Dr. Donald B. Darling was a leading pediatric radiologist who worked at the Floating Hospital for Children, Tufts Medical Center, from 1961-2006. He was born in Washington D.C. in 1925. Darling received his bachelor's and his MD from Georgetown University before completing postgraduate training at Providence Hospital in Washington, D.C., Georgetown Hospital, Boston City Hospital (now the Boston Medical Center), Children's Hospital in Boston, and the Oak Ridge institute of Nuclear Studies in Knoxville, Tennessee. He took measures to monitor the amount of radiation children were exposed to during X-rays in the 1980s, before many doctors became concerned about such exposure. Dr. Darling died in Cambridge, Massachusetts in 2010.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is minimally processed and may not be available for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes research and subject files, 1960-1990; Northeastern University lectures; publications; TNEMC architectural plans; committee files (School of Medicine and library); School of Medicine faculty meeting minutes and announcements; and annual reports, budgets, and statistics, 1960-1985.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: 75 years from the date of creation. 20 years from date of creation.
